name: Block Puzzle - Jigsaw Gallery
description:
Are you a tetris fan?
Try this new style block game!

Are you a jigsaw fan?
Do you interest in art?
Come here to build your beautiful picture gallery!

This game is revolution of popular block puzzle game and classic jigsaw game!

Block Puzzle:
Drag shapes to fill in the blank. A row or column full of blocks will be eliminated, and you will get some score.

Jigsaws Puzzle:
Drag pieces in the board to build a wonderful pictures! You will get more pieces when current pieces were combined!


I trust you will love it, download now!
developers: Hong Hai Wu Xian Technology Development Co
publishers: Beijing Hong Hai Wu Xian Technology Development Co
